summary: Improves the Lockpicking perk tree so it's more accessible.
descriptionHtml:
[font=verdana][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30502]Spanish translation by incata available now.[/url]

The Lockpicking tree was formatted in a way that necessitated wasting perks all over to get to anything good. I've changed this. Now, you can spend a few points to get some benefit, or spend a bunch if you need them for the same power.
Also available on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=77263149]Steam Workshop[/url].

[list][*]The lock mastery perks were collapsed into a single perk that's just called Lock Mastery. Each rank makes all locks 40% easier to pick. Their skill requirement progression was also changed to 0/20/40/60/80.
[*]Other requirements were also dropped. Quick Hands fell to 20, Wax Key to 30, Golden Touch to 40, Treasure Hunter to 60, and Locksmith to 70.
[/list][/font]
author: Kevin Kidder
